Thank you for your business with Office Depot!
I've recently tried to reach you and left a voicemail, so I wanted to send you some information via email as well.
Based on your purchasing with Office Depot, you have qualified for a Preferred Business Account.
This would give you the benefit of Customized Business Pricing as opposed to the retail pricing you are currently receiving.
There's no cost or obligation. We simply value your business and want to extend greater discounts along with a dedicated account manager to assist with your company needs. I've attached an information sheet here for your review as well.
Some benefits include:
Big Ink & Toner Deals - 10% of Office Depot Brand & 5% on OEM Breakroom and Facilities Products - core list of over 1,000 items discounted Business Select Catalog - 5% off a variety of items most needed in business like yours Exclusive Tech Savings - 6% off select technology items Great Copy & Print Services - 2.5 cents for B/W and 22 cents for colored copies along with 40% off finishing services Core list of 15 of your high volume items with even deeper discounts!
You'll receive exclusive offers, fast & free delivery for qualifying orders over $50, and get your discounted business pricing in any retail store!
We also provide flexible payment options for either credit card or account billing / Net30 terms to accounts that qualify!
If you are interested please reply back to me with the following information so that I can get started on your business account. If you are not interested also let me know so I can close this request.
